io.libsoft.contactcard.service

Class FileManagerService

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.libsoft.contactcard.service.FileManagerService

  • public class FileManagerService
extends Object
    File manager service class, all file and path requests are handled here

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      File getImageDirectory()
      Help method to get the image file directory or create it if it doesn't exist.
      static FileManagerService getInstance()
      Get the singleton instance for the service
      Map<String,List<String>> getNames()
      Loader method called at database initialization to load raw data in the database for future use (Pre-load).
      String getTessDataPath()
      Loader method that returns the data path for the tessaract api engine, if the data is not in the tesseract folder the method will create the folder and save the save the data to a "traineddate.eng" file
      File saveImage(Bitmap bitmap)
      Save method which converts Bitmap into a a file, with the name at the given time.
      static void setApplicationContext(Application applicationContext)
      Sets the context required by any services used by this service.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • setApplicationContext

        public static void setApplicationContext(Application applicationContext)
        Sets the context required by any services used by this service.
        Parameters:
        applicationContext - Context used for signing in.

      • getInstance

        public static FileManagerService getInstance()
        Get the singleton instance for the service
        Returns:
        FileManagerService instance

      • saveImage

        public File saveImage(Bitmap bitmap)
        Save method which converts Bitmap into a a file, with the name at the given time.
        Parameters:
        bitmap - to be saved
        Returns:
        File path the bitmap was saved to.

      • getNames

        public Map<String,List<String>> getNames()
        Loader method called at database initialization to load raw data in the database for future use (Pre-load).
        Returns:
        map containing the List of strings for roughly 100,000 first and last names.

      • getTessDataPath

        public String getTessDataPath()
        Loader method that returns the data path for the tessaract api engine, if the data is not in the tesseract folder the method will create the folder and save the save the data to a "traineddate.eng" file
        Returns:
        String path containing the tesseract data folder

      • getImageDirectory

        public File getImageDirectory()
        Help method to get the image file directory or create it if it doesn't exist.
        Returns:
        File corresponding to the image directory.
